feed.title: GitHub Haskell Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Haskell in GitHub

entry.title: NicolasT/generic-storage
entry.summary:
An implementation of "Generic Storage in Haskell"

generic-storage

An implementation of "Generic Storage in Haskell_".

To run the demo::

$ runhaskell -isrc demo.hs

Or, when using cabal-dev::

$ cabal-dev install-deps
$ runhaskell -package-conf=cabal-dev/packages-7.4.1.conf -isrc demo.hs

The output (at the time of writing) should be something like

::

Rendering tree
("in",Leaf)
("in",Leaf)
("in",Leaf)
("in",Leaf)
("in",Branch "c" 3 () ())
("in",Branch "b" 2 () ())
("in",Branch "a" 1 () ())
Looking up a node
("out",Branch "a" 1 () ())
("out",Leaf)
("out",Branch "b" 2 () ())
("out",Leaf)
("out",Branch "c" 3 () ())
("out",Leaf)
("out",Leaf)
Result: Just 1

.. _Generic Storage in Haskell: http://www.andres-loeh.de/GenericStorage/wgp10-genstorage.pdf
